data.oai_dc:dc: Geographic coordinates and genotype data for the analysis of the spatial genetic structure of the liverwort Crossocalyx hellerianus, population Y

Nuclear microsatellite data from Hola E. et al. (2015, PloS ONE, 10, e0133134) for population Y of the liverwort Crossocalyx hellerianus, with pairwise geographic distance matrix (in cm).If you use the data in this file, please cite the original publication:Holá, E., Košnar, J., & Kučera, J. (2015) Comparison of genetic structure of epixylic liverwort Crossocalyx Hellerianus between central European and Fennoscandian populations. PloS ONE, 10, e0133134.
Dispersal|bryophytes|spatial genetic structure|isolation-by-distance|inverse isolation hypothesis|long-distance dispersal|spores
